description: Try our easy to follow Avocado And Pea Smash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Toast,Pescatarian,Halal,High fibre,High protein,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Low sugar,Avocado,Sesame free
name: Avocado And Pea Smash Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 avocado, peeled, pitted, cut into 2cm cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Cook peas in a saucepan of boiling water for 2 minutes. Refresh in iced water and drain. Transfer to a mixing bowl and mash lightly with a fork.
Add avocado, lime juice and a pinch of salt and pepper, and mash lightly to combine. Set aside.
Drizzle toasted sourdough slices with olive oil and rub lightly with half of a garlic clove.
Top toast with pea and avocado mix, goat’s cheese, chilli flakes and pea shoots. Serve.
